query_results.top_post: What needs to be specified, which coffee? Arabica might become luxury soon because of the rising prices, does Robusta have all the same capabilities? https://t.co/YUIr4xL9lX

reason: Fed Policy Shock: HAWKISH_PIVOT - The May FOMC minutes released within the last 48 hours revealed that several officials expressed a willingness to further tighten policy if inflation risks materialise, a more hawkish stance than the market anticipated.

payload.summary: The May FOMC minutes released within the last 48 hours revealed that several officials expressed a willingness to further tighten policy if inflation risks materialise, a more hawkish stance than the market anticipated.
payload.market_impact: Bullish for USD due to 'higher-for-longer' rate expectations; Bearish for Gold and commodities as yields rise.
